languages.text: "Мы носим маски на лицах. Но не на душах". {n}Губы воительницы чуть изгибаются.{/n} "Я — ткач смерти снаружи, но внутри я человек... как и ты".
"We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."
languages.original_text: "Мы носим маски на лицах. Но не на душах". {n}Губы воительницы чуть изгибаются.{/n} "Я — ткач смерти снаружи, но внутри я человек... как и ты".

traits.locale_text: "We wear masks on our faces. Not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a weaver of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."
"We wear masks on our faces. Not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a weaver of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

"We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

languages.text: "Wir tragen Masken auf unseren Gesichtern, nicht auf unseren Seelen." {n}Ihre Mundwinkel zucken.{/n} "Ich mag eine Spinnerin des Todes sind, aber im Inneren bin ich ein Mensch ... wie Ihr."
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

traits.locale_text: "Wir tragen Masken auf unseren Gesichtern, nicht auf unseren Seelen." {n}Ihre Mundwinkel zucken.{/n} "Ich mag eine Spinnerin des Todes sind, aber im Inneren bin ich ein Mensch ... wie Ihr."

languages.text: «Llevamos máscaras sobre nuestros rostros, no sobre nuestras almas». {n}Las comisuras de sus labios se crispan.{/n} «Soy una tejedora de muerte, pero sigo siendo humana por dentro... al igual que usted».
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

traits.locale_text: «Llevamos máscaras sobre nuestros rostros, no sobre nuestras almas». {n}Las comisuras de sus labios se crispan.{/n} «Soy una tejedora de muerte, pero sigo siendo humana por dentro... al igual que usted».

languages.text: 「私たちが仮面を被るのは顔であって、魂ではないわ」{n}彼女の口角がゆがむ。{/n}「私は死の紡績工かもしれないけれど、心の中は人間なの…あなたと同じで」
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちが仮面を被るのは顔であって、魂ではないわ」{n}彼女の口角がゆがむ。{/n}「私は死の織り手かもしれないけれど、心の中は人間なの…あなたと同じで」

languages.text: “我们会把面具戴在脸上，而非我们的灵魂上。”{n}她的嘴角抽搐了一下。{/n}“或许我确实是死亡的编织者，但我仍然有着活人的灵魂……你也一样。”
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

traits.locale_text: “我们会把面具戴在脸上，而非我们的灵魂上。”{n}她的嘴角抽搐了一下。{/n}“或许我确实是死亡的编织者，但我仍然有着活人的灵魂……你也一样。”

languages.text: « Nous portons des masques sur nos visages, pas sur nos âmes. » {n}Les coins de sa bouche tressautent.{/n} « Je suis peut-être une tisseuse, mais je reste humaine... comme vous. »
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."

traits.locale_text: « Nous portons des masques sur nos visages, pas sur nos âmes. » {n}Les coins de sa bouche tressautent.{/n} « Je suis peut-être une tisseuse, mais je reste humaine... comme vous. »

languages.text: "Maskeleri yüzlerimize takarız, ruhlarımıza değil." {n}Dudağının kenarları kıpırdıyor.{/n} "Bir ölüm dokuru olabilirim ama içten içe hâlâ insanım. Tıpkı senin gibi..."
languages.original_text: "We wear masks on our faces, not on our souls." {n}The corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I may be a spinner of death, but I'm still a human inside... as are you."
